fields.name: output_id
fields.description: A unique identifier for the GPT output.

fields.name: generated_text
fields.description: The text generated by the GPT.

fields.name: creation_date
fields.description: The date and time when the output was generated.

fields.name: gpt_version
fields.description: The version of the GPT that generated the output.

fields.name: input_prompt
fields.description: The input prompt or query that was used to generate the output.

fields.name: output_length
fields.description: The length of the generated output, typically measured in characters or words.

fields.name: response_time
fields.description: The time taken by the GPT to generate the output.

fields.name: confidence_score
fields.description: A score indicating the confidence level of the GPT in its generated output (if applicable).

fields.name: output_format
fields.description: The format of the output, e.g., text, JSON, code.

fields.name: usage_context
fields.description: The context or application for which the output was generated, e.g., customer support, content creation.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The language in which the output was generated.

fields.name: sentiment_analysis
fields.description: The sentiment of the output text, e.g., positive, negative, neutral.

fields.name: readability_score
fields.description: A score indicating the readability of the output, such as Flesch-Kincaid.

fields.name: keyword_density
fields.description: The density of specific keywords in the output text.

fields.name: grammar_check
fields.description: Results of a grammar check performed on the output.

fields.name: plagiarism_score
fields.description: A score indicating the likelihood of the output containing plagiarized content.

fields.name: toxicity_level
fields.description: A score indicating the level of toxic or harmful content in the output.

fields.name: generated_images
fields.description: List of any images generated alongside the text output.

fields.name: reference_links
fields.description: List of external links or references included in the output.

fields.name: execution_environment
fields.description: The environment in which the GPT was executed (e.g., cloud, local).

fields.name: api_key_used
fields.description: The API key used for generating the output, if applicable.

fields.name: user_feedback
fields.description: Feedback provided by the user regarding the output.

fields.name: output_revision
fields.description: The number of times the output was revised or regenerated.

fields.name: temperature_setting
fields.description: The temperature setting used during generation, influencing randomness.

fields.name: top_p_setting
fields.description: The top-p setting used during generation, influencing token sampling.

fields.name: frequency_penalty
fields.description: The frequency penalty applied during generation.

fields.name: presence_penalty
fields.description: The presence penalty applied during generation.

fields.name: token_count
fields.description: The number of tokens generated in the output.

fields.name: contextual_relevance
fields.description: A measure of how relevant the output is to the input prompt.

fields.name: custom_parameters
fields.description: Any custom parameters used in generating the output.

fields.name: model_type
fields.description: The type of model used for generating the output (e.g., GPT-4, fine-tuned model).

fields.name: output_category
fields.description: The category of the generated output, such as informational, creative, technical.

fields.name: word_count
fields.description: The total number of words in the generated output.

fields.name: character_count
fields.description: The total number of characters in the generated output.

fields.name: grammar_errors
fields.description: The number of grammar errors detected in the output.

fields.name: spelling_errors
fields.description: The number of spelling errors detected in the output.

fields.name: time_stamp
fields.description: Time stamps of key moments during output generation, such as start and end times.

fields.name: generation_method
fields.description: The method used to generate the output, such as batch processing or real-time.

fields.name: data_source
fields.description: The data source or training data used to inform the generated output.

fields.name: multimodal_content
fields.description: Details of any multimodal content (e.g., text combined with images or audio).

fields.name: user_intent
fields.description: The user's intent or goal for the generated output.

fields.name: contextual_bias
fields.description: Information about any biases detected in the output.

fields.name: legal_disclaimer
fields.description: Any legal disclaimers associated with the output.

fields.name: output_quality_score
fields.description: An overall quality score for the generated output.

fields.name: audience_suitability
fields.description: Evaluation of whether the output is suitable for the intended audience.

fields.name: custom_styles
fields.description: Any custom styles applied to the output, such as tone or format.
